hero.subtitle: Experts in software development, engineering, and consulting in robotics, logic, and systems

gallery.title: Engineering Excellence in Action
gallery.description: Explore our innovative software solutions and engineering expertise in machine element calculations, gear modeling, and system optimization.

services.title: Our services
services.description: We offer a range of services to our clients

service1.title: Software Development
service1.subtitle: We develop specialized software for machine element calculations, tailored to your specific needs. Our solutions enable precise modeling and analysis of gears and gear systems.

service2.title: Engineering
service2.subtitle: We offer comprehensive engineering services for optimizing bearings and shafts in your mechanical systems. Our team provides expert design and verification of all key components.

service3.title: Consulting
service3.subtitle: Our experts advise you in selecting the best solutions for complete drive systems. With our knowledge and experience, we help you achieve optimal performance, reliability, and longevity of your systems.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Bauhar d.o.o. is an engineering company based in Bled, specializing in software development for machine element calculations. We provide engineering services and consulting for gears, bearings, shafts, and complete drive systems in Slovenia and the Balkan region.
about.paragraph2: Our team combines expertise with practical experience to provide precise and efficient solutions. As the official representative of KISSsoft® software for six Balkan countries, we offer comprehensive support in implementing advanced engineering tools.
